sub_title: Senior Program Manager Lead @ ING | MBA, Strategic Marketing, Agile Project Management, Business Transformation
summary:
As a Senior Program Manager Lead at ING, I have 10+ years of experience in leading complex and strategic programs that deliver value to the business and the customers. I have a strong background in marketing, product management, tech, and innovation, with a focus on the financial sector and platforms.

My core competencies include cross-functional team leadership, strategic planning, scrum, stakeholder management, and communication. I am passionate about creating and implementing solutions that drive digital and financial transformation, enhance customer experience, and foster cross-border collaboration. Currently, I am responsible for the development of a new investment platform for Private and Business Banking in Belgium, leading 13 project teams and member of the Leadership Team. I also contribute as an advisor to Stelvio Finance, a consultancy firm that specializes in funding for healthcare investments.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for the development of a new investment platform to replace the existing platform for Private and Business Banking in Belgium. I lead 13 work streams working successfully on back-end and front-end systems, migration, operational processes, communication and training. I manage the roadmap in an agile organisation that also works on business growth and legal commitments. I am part of the central leadership team consisting of both Business and Tech leaders. I structured the entire programme, including the vision, business case, governance, appointing and mentoring project leaders, setting up effective and predictable delivery organisation and roadmap. I manage stakeholder relations within the bank up to the C-level. Thanks to my strategy and approach, we are achieving success, cooperation is good and we are on track to deliver the program milestones.
profile_positions.title: Senior Program Manager Lead

profile_positions.description:
As the Program Manager for the realization of a shared platform at ING Investments Belgium and Netherlands, my main focus was to successfully implement the platform that facilitated the unification of product offerings and amplified cross-border innovation and delivery. I led a diverse team of professionals and provided strategic direction, ensuring the successful execution of the project while meeting all business and technical requirements.

Responsibilities:
-	Oversaw the successful execution of the shared platform realization program, ensuring that project milestones were met on time and within budget.
-	Collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to gather requirements, define project scope, and set objectives.
-	Managed risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and quality assurance to ensure the successful implementation of the shared platform.
-	Led a team of professionals and fostered an environment conducive to innovation, collaboration, and high performance.
-	Worked closely with the Tribe Leadership Action Board, other Tribe Leads and the central transformation office to ensure alignment with the overall business strategy and objectives.
-	Monitored project progress, prepared and presented reports on the status of the project to stakeholders on C-level

Achievements:
- Successfully led the realization of a new shared platform that facilitated a harmonized product offering across Belgium and Netherlands.
- Oversaw the smooth migration of 600,000 customers to the new platform, ensuring minimal disruption and maintaining customer satisfaction.
- Implemented a new way of work amongst 600+ advisors, driving efficiency and productivity within the organization.
- Completed one of the most complex and ambitious projects withing ING (it was tried 3 times before without success) 
- Fostered an environment of innovation and collaboration, resulting in accelerated cross-border delivery and product development.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager - Shared Platform Realization

profile_positions.description:
In my role as the PMI Business Lead, my core responsibilities were to define the target value proposition for ING Investments Belgium and Netherlands, with a key objective to create a harmonized product offering and an architectural target model. My work served as a central pivot point in the overall business strategy, driving forward cross-border collaboration and integration.  With the harmonized proposition we accelerated cross-border innovation and delivery, capitalizing on the shared platform to drive operational efficiency, enhance product offerings and foster greater market reach.
Achievements:
- Successfully reduced complexity and enhanced the quality of the shared platform, resulting in accelerated innovation and delivery across borders.
- Successfully designed the creation of an architectural target model 
- Successfully designed and implemented a cross-border Tribe structure with 35 agile teams, driving operational efficiency, and enhancing collaboration and productivity.
